VARIABLES.NAME: value
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The value of the variable, the type for this can differ depending on the variable type

VARIABLES.NAME: created_timestamp
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The Unix Timestamp for when this variable was created

VARIABLES.NAME: last_updated_timestamp
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The Unix Timestamp for when this variable was last updated

VARIABLES.NAME: size
VARIABLES.DESCRIPTION: The size that this variable takes up (including it's metadata) in bytes
